mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event_day ( eday_idx, event_idx, store_max, event_starttime, event_stoptime ) VALUES ( eday_seq.nextVal, #{event_idx}, #{store_max}, TO_TIMESTAMP(#{event_starttime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), TO_TIMESTAMP(#{event_stoptime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') )
mapper.select: select event_idx from event_day where eday_idx = #{eday_idx}
